VICKERS HARDNESS DATA

Note the units in the Vickers formula.
Note that the units in these data files are grams and microns.

The "Fusion" zone is weld metal.

Filename: V6061Program: Vickers Hardness Profile01-G4bDate: Wed, Nov 6, 2002Time: 12:37 PMName: ME330Vickers Mass:   500 gMaterial: 6061 AluminumID: Chamfer/NormalCalibration Distance:  1.00 mm
